sn4.10:1.2: The Bamboo Grove was a major monastery near Rājagaha. According to Kd 1:22.16.1, it was offered by King Bimbisāra as the very first monastery dedicated to the Saṅgha.
sn4.10:2.4: A hundred years was the standard long life (eg. Snp 3.8:16.1, DN 14:3.30.5, AN 7.74:10.3).
sn4.10:4.4: This echoes the idea that a wheeled chariot was unstoppable (SN 56.11:12.2), an idea arising from the Vedic conception of the Sun as a wheel.
